data.text: And after him rose up Nathan to prophesy in the time of David.
As is the fat taken away from the peace offering,
He played with lions as with kids,
Slew he not a giant, when he was yet but young?
For he called upon the most high Lord;
So the people honored him with ten thousands,
For he destroyed the enemies on every side,
In all his works he praised the Holy One most high with words of glory;
He set singers also before the altar,
He beautified their feasts,
The Lord took away his sins,
After him rose up a wise son,
Solomon reigned in a peaceable time, and was honored;
How wise wast thou in thy youth,
Thy soul covered the whole earth,
Thy name went far unto the islands;
The countries marveled at thee for thy songs,
By the name of the Lord God,
Thou didst bow thy loins unto women,
Thou didst stain thy honor,
So the kingdom was divided,
But the Lord will never leave off his mercy,
Thus rested Solomon with his fathers,
And their sins were multiplied exceedingly,
For they sought out all wickedness,
